page.title: 13A Day In My Life.
page.content: {An account written by Louise Wilcox of {Bryngwn School. On Saturday morning at 9.30am my alarm clock went off,I got up and went to the bathroom to wash and dress.Then I went down stairs and sat with my baby sister.I got up and turned the television on.My mam was in the kitchen making a cup of tea,so I went in and brought my tea and the baby's bottle.When it was 10.00am my dad came down and turned the tele. over to "Captain Caveman" and the news.I went up stairs to play on my Atari.After I took the baby out in the pram.At 11.00 we went to our friends from Gloucester who had come on a visit.We showed them around our house and in the afternoon we went to Llangynidr Reservoir.When we came home we watched "The Grumble Weeds"and "Dynasty".
